headline: Former Aide Depicts Chaotic Decision-Making in Trump White House
summary: Former Trump messaging aide Cliff Sims, in the new book ‘Team of Vipers,’ describes how internal subterfuge and bickering among top advisers helped stall parts of the president’s agenda.

headline: L.A. Teachers Reach Deal to End Strike

headline: FBI Agents Group Warns Shutdown Imperils Investigations

This is a conundrum facing many influential raters, including Amazon.com, Yelp and TripAdvisor, who have had to fend off attempts to game reviews.
